calculate isoforest score from df

Source: R/ranking.R
score_isoforest.Rd

calculate isoforest score from df

Usage

score_isoforest(df)

Arguments

df

database

Value

vector

Examples

score_isoforest(iris[sapply(iris, is.numeric)])
